# Refactoring Goal: Popup

Target: `/popup`

## Objectives
- [ ] Analyze current structure and dependencies
- [ ] Ensure alignment with "Screaming Architecture"
- [ ] Update or create `README.md` in the directory
- [ ] Verify if logic can be moved to `features/` or `shared/`
- [ ] Maximize code reusability
